Content_wSideColumn.Name: Help Wanted Postings
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Help Wanted Postings
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: List of local job postings that are temporary - just a few hours, few days or few weeks.

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Looking for a little extra cash or gas money? This page contains odd jobs and tasks listed by local community members - you'll find personal service needs like painting a house, helping someone move, raking leaves and yard work, etc.

These are jobs for which someone would like to hire a student for only a few hours or a few days .

For career and "regular" employment postings, internships, etc - please be sure to visit Career Navigator .

BYU-Idaho strives to ensure all postings are legitimate, and advises you to use caution and common sense in applying for any position.

Contact Name: Buddy Wright
Company Name: CTS Auto Wash.
Job Description: We provide fleet wash services for UPS. We do this in 3 different states and several different cities. Currently I am looking for a person to wash UPS trucks at the Rexburg Location. It should be  understood that this position is manual labor and should be considered labor intensive. You can expect to get dirty and wet washing these trucks. Even though we wash trucks In doors, the seasons bring temperatures and conditions that a potential employee should consider.      
Hours:  This work shift is Monday through Friday. The shift starts around 5:30 pm. And usually works 5 - 6 hours / day for around 25 - 30 hours / week.
Wage: I would start the right person out at $11.00 / hour.  
Requirements/Qualifications: A drivers license and some driving skills are required for this position, as it is that after we wash these trucks we are required to park each vehicle in its assigned parking spot. Several of these trucks are standard transmission and therefore require this employee to be able to drive stick.
How to Apply: If you are interested in this position please  call Buddy Wright at (801) 682-3388 to schedule an interview. Or you can send a resume to ctsautowash@gmail.com.

Contact Name: Larissa Jaster
Company: Jaster Family
Contact Phone: 425-770-2632
Location: Rexburg, Idaho
Email Address: larissajaster@gmail.com
Job Title: Babysitter/Nanny
Job Description: My husband and I both work from home, so I am needing a babysitter to watch my 21 month old daughter from around 9:30am to 12:30pm M-F until she goes down for a nap. Our offices are downstairs so we will be home while you watch her. She just needs a play mate so we can work. :) We will be interviewing to find the right person.
Requirements / Qualifications: Please give references.
Start Date: ~August 25th
Hours: 3 hours a day
Pay / Wage: $6 an hour
How to Apply: Call or e-mail Larissa.
Other / Comments: Please call or e-mail for more information or if you have questions. 
Posted: 8/15/14

Company: TEG Global
Location: Idaho Falls
Job Title: Contract: MS .NET Application Developers with Telerik and Cyber Security
Job Description: TEG Global is seeking two positions for Sr Programmer Analyst Technical Developers with Microsoft .Net coding skills
Below is a description of what we are looking for. 
1 resource: needs 7 years experience and a Bachelors or an Advanced Degree and 5 years experience. 
1 resource: needs 11 years experience and a Bachelors or an Advanced Degree and 9 years experience. 
Job Description: Client is looking for a mid-level .NET Application Developer that can quickly step in and develop .NET code with little technical assistance from our client's existing development team. This individual will work under the direction of project managers and work leads and be expected to track all work in a task tracking system and follow our development processes. This will be a 6 month assignment with a government client requiring US citizenship. The work is being performed onsite in Idaho Falls, ID.
Required Skills: Individuals must have a working knowledge of and experience with the following software and tool development approaches and practices:
* Application development using Microsoft Visual Studio* Microsoft Visual C#.net* .NET 4.0 Framework Class Library* SQL Sever* Web Presentation Foundation (WPF)* Cyber Security background* Telerik tools* Object-oriented paradigm, design patterns and proper class design* Technical software quality assurance (SQA) documentation* Software configuration management within an agile development environment* Deployment and release of software from design through production
Client is an Affirmative Action/Equal Employment Opportunity employer (AA/EEO)/VEVRAA Federal Contractor.
For more job opportunities please see http://www.teg-global.com
How to Apply: Potential applicants are welcome and encouraged to call or email me directly at: darwinmecham@teg-global.com or call (208) 419-8555
Hours: Schedule is 8-5 daily - full time - no part time.
Length: Contract development for 6 Months Minimum.
Must be US Citizen & be able to qualify for a DOE clearance.
Must have:
* Application development using Microsoft Visual Studio
* Microsoft Visual C#.net
* .NET 4.0 Framework Class Library
* SQL Sever
* Web Presentation Foundation (WPF)
* Cyber Security background
* Telerik tools
* Object-oriented paradigm, design patterns and proper class design
* Technical software quality assurance (SQA) documentation
* Software configuration management within an agile development environment
* Deployment and release of software from design through production

Start Date: 8/4/14
Hours: To be arranged
Pay / Wage: DOE

Posted: 8/12/14

Job Description: Zylun Insights is a premier consumer insights corporation with the mission of bringing clarity to the most pressing business problems organizations face. Our fast-paced and engaging environment provides our employees with a competitive wage, meaningful work, skills development, and is a perfect complement for individuals looking to pair their educational pursuits with real-world business exposure. Our Rexburg office is expanding. Advancement opportunities exist for those with sound character and the ability to lead others by example and manage processes effectively. We maintain a respectful, clean and comfortable office environment, work hard and believe in having a great time. We provide flexible scheduling to help our employees balance their busy lives. Administer surveys by telephone to our clients' customers, business professionals and the general public across the nation. ABSOLUTELY NO SELLING, EVER.
Requirements / Qualifications: Must be 17+, ability to read and speak English well, key 30 wpm, be curious and professionally represent the companies with whom we work. (Having a good sense of humor is a plus, but not an absolute requirement.)
Hours: 12-30 hours/wk with flexible scheduling
Pay / Wage: $8.50/hr base wage with achievable incentives up to $10.50/hr
Please apply by sending a resume to  jobs@zyluninsights.com
Posted: From 8/12/14 to 9/30/14

Contact Name: Robert Budenbender or Jon Decker
Company: We Hang Christmas Lights
Contact Phone: 480-389-6404
Address, City, State: 6497 S. Tucana Lane  Gilbert AZ, 85298
Job Title: Christmas Light Installers
Job Description: Help needed from off track students in the fall from the second week in October 13th. - Dec 20th  and optional extension from January 2 - 31 2015.  We are a growing  small business in Gilbert Arizona and we install and take down Christmas lights and decorations. 
Requirements/Qualifications : Hardworking and trust worthy. Must be able to to go up and down ladders and get on roofs.  Have a  Driver's Licence. Work with 3-5 man crew all day (Room and Board NOT included) Please send resume and references to info@azchristmaslights.com 
Pay/Wage:  Starting at $12.00 (depending on experience)  ( a bonus is payable if you complete season through January 31st, 2015)    Start Date: Oct. 13th (6 days a week) no Sundays    End Date: Dec. 20 or option to extend January 1 - 31,  2015
Hours:  Full Time ( possible over time) 
How to Apply: Click on this link http://azchristmaslights.com/jobs  and fill out and submit form and we will contact you when we receive it.
Posted: 8/12/14
